argument.name: xbasic
argument.description: Xbasic code saved in a character variable.

argument.name: msg
argument.description: Optional. The message to display in the warning dialog box.

page.description: Closes all open window and then runs some Xbasic. After Xbasic runs, the current window is reopened.
page.discussion: The A5RunXbasicAfterClosingWindows() function closes all open windows (and the tables behind them), runs Xbasic code, then restores the current window. This function is useful for performing <TBL>.PACK()operations that require exclusive access to a table. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example, when attached to a button on the customer form, closes the form, displays a message box, executes the specified Xbasic code after the user presses OK, then redisplays the customer form.
section.example:
dim code as C code = <<%code% t = table.open("customer") t.pack() t.close() %code%
A5RunXbasicAfterClosingWindows(code, "Temporary Shutdown" )
